escape.title: Escape
escape.description: You break free from the loop. Both selves integrate. You leave the kitchen behind, but carry the weight of what you've learned.

expose.title: Expose
expose.description: You reveal the truth about severance. The system is exposed, but you're not sure if you've truly escaped or just started a new loop.

liberation.title: Liberation
liberation.description: You work with others to break free. Solidarity triumphs. You're not alone in this fight.

surrender.title: Surrender
surrender.description: You accept the split. The loop continues. You become another lost soul in the machine.

loop.title: Loop Reset
loop.description: Convergence failed. The loop resets. You keep one puzzle card and try again.
